Good afternoon everyone... I am a graduate school student at
California Sta=
te University (CSUDH). My graduate research/thesis is on
the topic of seppu=
ku. I did about 2 years of research on the topic
both here and in Japan. Ho=
wever, my advisor really doesnt like my
ideas. I need something more ground=
-breaking to really make this a
good project. It is a difficult subject to =
develope new ideas around.
I am moving back to Japan in March, so it would =
be nice to get some
momentum before I leave. I am just wondering if anyone =
has any
innovative ideas on this topic. My   original plan was to show that=

the spirit of bushido is embodied in the practice of seppuku even to
moder=
n times (ex. Yukio Mishima). 

Thanks for reading and God Bless.

Jpellgen@=
